title: Chapter 1423 - Declaring War
volume_title: His Sword Takes Aim A The Three Thousand Worlds Of The Stars, Suppressing Foes Both Past And Present
body:
Chapter 1423 - Declaring War

Within Su Yi’s sea of consciousness.

Although his sixth incarnation never said anything, he could sense the transformation of Su Yi’s soul, and he knew that Su Yi had actually stepped onto that unprecedented Path of Transcendence.

Indeed, reincarnation is the key to mastering the Sword of the Nine Hells! Only then can the sword protect its wielder from the Contract of the Gods.

Going forward, his path will be completely different. Should he one day become an immortal, he’ll become the unprecedented, first immortal of his kind!

Wang Ye sighed to himself. But if he loses our battle of the heart, everything will change….

……

That night, Su Yi awakened from his post-breakthrough contemplative state and stabilized his cultivation base.

That same night, in the Impermeable Demon Ocean, Daoist Master Red Cloud received a message from the dog, Xing Que. 

“With a mortal body, he crushed an immortal revenant beneath his feet?” Daoist Master Red Cloud was unwittingly stunned.

She couldn’t help but recall their ancestral precept.

Their clan saw it as their greatest secret. Only main-branch descendants were qualified to learn it, and even then,...
